messages: 78d029a178c75db05a1ca3e795507229 (15:04): reisio: I need to head off to bed right away.  I will catch you again another time.  Thanks for the advice and talk.  I will remind you about that layout nexttime.
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (15:06): Anbidian: will leave you a memo
78d029a178c75db05a1ca3e795507229 (15:07): *nods* Have a good day/night whatever it is there, where ever it is you are.
78d029a178c75db05a1ca3e795507229 (15:18): reisio: oh we are on the same continent :| when are you going to crash? only 4am here
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (15:19): Anbidian: oh, either a few hours from now or many hours from now
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (15:19): if I make it past noon I'll probably make it till 6pm or so
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (15:19): I might ingest some caffeine and cheat
78d029a178c75db05a1ca3e795507229 (15:24): you are one of those productive people aren't you
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (15:30): just not a fan of sleeping
78d029a178c75db05a1ca3e795507229 (15:31): sleep gets in the way, but it is also that pure unalloyed state where one has no problems ;)

e06a2753034fa988d213359602797f06 (15:37): hi everyone, I have the following html, http://pastebin.ca/172829. The final form is display on the following line to the rest of the input but I'd like to all to be in line. Does anyone know how to do that?
2cc864c76a01fdb21490303c5b52e630 (15:39): Do the forms have more than 1 line ?
2cc864c76a01fdb21490303c5b52e630 (15:39): If not then display: inline; both of them
e06a2753034fa988d213359602797f06 (15:42): thanks digitok, I'll give that a g
78d029a178c75db05a1ca3e795507229 (15:43): reisio: how much do you charge for a template design?
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (15:44): depends on a lot of things
78d029a178c75db05a1ca3e795507229 (15:44): of course.  Just a rough range, I have no idea what the range would even be.
78d029a178c75db05a1ca3e795507229 (15:46): yes, something like the aquatic one you made
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (15:46): well, if you were some commercial entity that I didn't have any respect for

44cfaa7a7689f77daeafc44d2dcbf1cf (15:46): I'm currently trying to style my tables on this page: http://home.icio.co.uk/chasstewart/showers.html but the padding that I apply in the css is not taking effect. What can be causing this? I copy and pasted the CSS from another document that I created, the padding on the tables worked fine
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (15:48): like $20-$30/hour plus extra for each browser plus extra if it's something tricky plus extra if I have to do any graphic design plus extra for a logo
78d029a178c75db05a1ca3e795507229 (15:48): from a biz prospective that sounds more than reasonable, though i have no idea what biz's pay for that service on average
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (15:50): they have lots of money and no expertise
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (15:50): so they pay whatever you need
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (15:50): so it's good that it pays so well if you know what you're doing
78d029a178c75db05a1ca3e795507229 (15:52): reisio, and what of your rate for people like myself who accost you on IRC and have relatively simpler needs?
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (15:56): icio: your #content * { selector is overriding it
44cfaa7a7689f77daeafc44d2dcbf1cf (15:57): yep, sorted. Thanks for taking a look, reisio, I forgot that code was in the document
3d85dcdee274f0991aa6ec42944acf98 (16:04): Anyone know of a min-height hack for ie?
